original:
Pharmacophore modeling is a crucial aspect of understanding the structure-activity relationship (SAR) of compounds in relation to therapeutic targets. It represents only one component of the broader landscape of SAR.


Recent advancements in chemoproteomic strategies have broadened the identification of druggable targets. Historically, successful pharmaceuticals have primarily focused on well-defined binding pockets within druggable pro
